function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"IEQ sensor nodes connected to the Internet potentially vulnerable to cyberattacks","Impact":"Compromise of monitoring data, potential interference with sensor functionality","Mitigation":"Implementing strong encryption, regular security updates, and network monitoring","Technologies":"Encryption protocols, intrusion detection systems, network monitoring tools","People":"Users of the IEQ monitoring system, facility occupants","Owner":"IT department, system administrators"},{"Description":"Cloud services accessed from anywhere in the Internet increase risk of data breaches","Impact":"Unauthorized access to sensitive monitoring data, potential exposure of personal information","Mitigation":"Implementing strong access controls, encryption, and regular security audits","Technologies":"Access control mechanisms, encryption protocols, penetration testing tools","People":"Users of the cloud services, individuals whose data is collected","Owner":"Cloud service provider, IT department"},{"Description":"Wide distribution of smart IEQ sensor nodes increases risk of spreading contagious diseases","Impact":"Potential for rapid spread of contagious diseases within the facility","Mitigation":"Implementing regular cleaning and maintenance of sensor nodes, promoting hygiene practices among users","Technologies":"Disinfection methods, remote monitoring for maintenance, user education platforms","People":"Facility occupants, users of the IEQ monitoring system","Owner":"Facility management, health and safety officers"}]}
